snippet: The Justice Department has asked a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit seeking to compel the Obama administration to release more internal records involving Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: Justice Department asks federal court to dismiss lawsuit by the House oversight committee seeking to compel the Obama administration to release more internal records involving the botched gun-trafficking case known as Operation Fast and Furious.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has asked a federal court to dismiss a lawsuit seeking to compel the Obama administration to release more internal records involving Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.main: Dismissal of Gun Suit Is Sought
headline.print_headline: Dismissal Of Gun Suit Is Sought

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
